The manipulated photo was published on F: 2019, and has been shared more than 300 times.
The post: s Hindi-language caption translates to English as: “See the (knowledge) of Hindi of this JNU scholar, they actually wanted to write, ‘first clear the entrance test and then vent out on JNU'."

A journalist from AFP's Delhi bureau identified the woman in the photo as JNU student Priyanka Bharti, who has also posted several photos and videos of the recent protests on her social media pages, including the authentic photo of her holding the original placard.
